title: 077 - The Cookie Debate
description: On today's show, the guys debate which type of cookie is the best with a meme going around asking people to eliminate one cookie from the discussion. They also chat about Mitt having a rough weekend, Bill selling out and all of the sudden being a huge Year of the Buffalo fan, plus a loaded Pod FOD with questions about the best animated movie of all-time, and Elon Musk implanting chips into pigs' brains to be able to control their every move, and another dynamite drop-in from the Boobie Brothers from DAHN UNDER. Send in your submissions to the FOD @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram, and make sure you follow youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for everything PMI. We appreciate you all, enjoy.
dc:creator: The Pod
